alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 4:14PM EDT until September 08 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greene County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Lenoir County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jason, or near La Grange, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Snow Hill, Dawson, Institute, Jason, Lizzie, Castoria, Fort Run VFD, Shine, Bull Head VFD, and Walstonburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
